import React, { useRef, useState } from 'react' import style from '../design/style.css' import authlogo from '../design/authlogo.png' import { useAuth } from '../contexts/AuthContext' export default function SignUpPage() { const emailRef = useRef() const passwordRef = useRef() const passwordConfirmRef = useRef() const { signup } = useAuth() function handleSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() signup(emailRef.current.value, passwordRef.current.value) } return (

) }
